about_the_game:
Remember one of the most popular stories from the bible.
The tower of babel is a unique tower - builder and role - playing game.
Pick a leader, hire workers, manage the economy and donations of the building site as well as the lives of your workers.
Remember you have 7 days to complete the tower before language barrier becomes a major problem.

FEATURES

.PICK A LEADER who is excellent in trade or relations with other nations or can increase worker productivity

.BUILD A FLOURISHING ECONOMY with donations from generous individuals worldwide as well as trading excess food and building materials for money

.KEEP THE WORKERS HAPPY by paying wages and feeding them or their productivity will continue to decline till they are barely working

.NEGIOATE TRADE DEALS when you are not satisfied with an initial trade offer but do not get the buyer frustrated or he will abandon the deal
